title: Microsoft Exchange Server users are being targeted by Hive ransomware attack
content:
Every other day, it seems like there’s a news story about some major security issue on a Microsoft product, and today, it seems like Microsoft’s Exchange Server is at the center of another one. Microsoft Exchange Server customers are being targeted by a wave of ransomware attacks carried out by Hive, a well-known ransomware-as-a-service (RaaS)

The post Microsoft Exchange Server users are being targeted by Hive ransomware attack appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Companies using outdated versions of Microsoft Exchange Server are being extorted through a new ransomware attack coordinated by Hive.
